thread.title: Great clean hotel, Good costumer service
thread.title_full: Great clean hotel, Good costumer service - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mdlongazel
title: Great clean hotel, Good costumer service
text:
The customer service was excellent. Clean modern room located near the center of
Manhattan. We went to the Thanksgiving parade and Macy's for Black Friday,
We had a great time. We felt safe with the security in the lobby. The staff was very helpful and friendly.
